name: LSLaunchFlags
desc: The specification for launching an app.

items.name: static var defaults: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests launching in the default manner (as if the only flags set were kLSLaunchNoParams, kLSLaunchAsync, and kLSLaunchStartClassic).

items.name: static var andPrint: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that documents opened in the application be printed.

items.name: static var andDisplayErrors: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that launch and open failures be displayed in the UI.

items.name: static var dontAddToRecents: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that the application or documents not be added to the Finderâ€™s Recent Items menu.

items.name: static var dontSwitch: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that the application be launched without being brought to the foreground.

items.name: static var async: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that the application be launched asynchronously.

items.name: static var newInstance: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that a new instance of the application be started, even if one is already running.

items.name: static var andHide: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that the application be hidden as soon as it completes its launch sequence.

items.name: static var andHideOthers: LSLaunchFlags
items.desc: Requests that other applications be hidden as soon as the opened application completes its launch sequence.
